ninja.ugly.prevail.event.factory
Interface UpdateEventFactory<K,V>

Type Parameters:
K - The type of key to update.
V - The type of value to update.
All Superinterfaces:
EventFactory<K,V>
All Known Implementing Classes:
UpdateEndEventFactory, UpdateEventFactory.EmptyUpdateEventFactory
public interface UpdateEventFactory<K,V>
extends EventFactory<K,V>

An EventFactory for update operations on Chunks.

Nested Class Summary
static class UpdateEventFactory.EmptyUpdateEventFactory<K,V>
          An empty implementation of the UpdateEventFactory interface.

Method Detail

startEvent

<E extends Event> com.google.common.base.Optional<E> startEvent(K key,
                                                                V value)
Generate a start event for updating the given key with the given value.

Type Parameters:
E - the type of event.
Parameters:
key - the key being updated.
value - the value to update with.
Returns:
an Optional containing the generated event. Not null.

endEvent

<E extends Event> com.google.common.base.Optional<E> endEvent(K key,
                                                              V value,
                                                              int numValuesUpdated)
Generate an end event for updating the given key with the given value.

Type Parameters:
E - the type of event.
Parameters:
key - the key being updated.
value - the value to update with.
numValuesUpdated - the number of values updated in the Chunk.
Returns:
an Optional containing the generated event. Not null.

exceptionEvent

<E extends Event> com.google.common.base.Optional<E> exceptionEvent(K key,
                                                                    V value,
                                                                    UpdateException exception)
Generate an exception event for updating the given key with the given value.

Type Parameters:
E - the type of event.
Parameters:
key - the key being updated.
value - the value to update with.
exception - the UpdateException raised while updated the key with the value at a Chunk.
Returns:
an Optional containing the generated event. Not null.
